basic_info.title: MTCP Scholarship 2024 by Malaysian Technical Cooperation
basic_info.author: Muhammad Saim Rasheed

program_details.description:
Applications are open for the **MTCP Scholarship 2024** by Malaysian Technical Cooperation. The Malaysian Technical cooperation helps in the Development of Malaysia. The MTCP Scholarship is **Funded** by the **Malaysian Government**.

Applicants from developing countries can apply for the **Master’s** degree programs in Malaysian Public and Private Universities. During the scholarship, you will also gain knowledge and skills that will contribute to the development of Malaysia country. IELTS is **not** required.

financial_coverage: An Allowance worth RM3,500 per month.
One Round Trip Airfare is covered.

waiver_conditions: If you have obtained a previous degree(s) with English used as the medium of instruction then you can submit English Language Proficiency proof.

required_documents: Latest Admission Offer Letter from Malaysian Universities for Academic Intake 2024
Letter of Recommendation from two referees
A certified copy of the Academic Transcript.
Record of all the courses taken throughout the degree program
Applicants must submit transcripts of their undergraduate studies.
Applicants must submit an official document issued by the applicant’s alma mater describing the university’s grade system.
If an applicant’s transcript does not include information on CGPA, marks, or score percentile, the documents must be certified.
A certified copy of the English Language Proficiency test result.
application_process: Applicants are required to submit an online application along with all the required documents in the PDF Scanned form.
